name: 2024 7th International Conference on Electronics and Electrical Engineering Technology
content: Paper Publication: 1\. IEEE Conference Publishing Services (CPS): included into IEEE Xplore, and submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex and Scopus. 2\. International Journal of Electrical and Electronic Engineering & Telecommunications (IJEETC, ISSN: 2319-2518): indexed in Scopus (since 2017), Google Scholar, Crossref, Citefactor, etc.
